name: Dyno Adventure
description: Experience an exhilarating new sense of fun while running, jumping and stomping on enemies as you take control of Dyno, a cute dragon who has lost their family. Dyno Adventure bring you everything fans love about 3D platforming. Help Dyno to look for their children!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista (both 32 and 64bit versions) Processor: Intel Core2Duo E7300 @ 2.5 GHz or AMD Athlon II X2 240 @ 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD5670 (1024MB VRAM) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: Runs on potatoes pc
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bits Processor: Intel Core i3 550 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD7850 (1024MB VRAM) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
